interpretation:
The Yellow Circle card represents the essence of wholeness and unity. It is a symbol of completion, perfection, and the infinite cycle of life. The yellow color is associated with the sun, which brings warmth and light to the world. It is also linked to gold, which represents wealth and prosperity.

This card reminds you that you are part of something bigger than yourself. You are connected to all living things and the universe as a whole. The Yellow Circle card urges you to embrace this connection and find your place in the world. It is a sign that you are on the right path and that everything is coming together as it should.

In a reading, the Yellow Circle card may represent a time of abundance and prosperity. It may also indicate a need for balance and harmony in your life. Embrace the energy of this card and let it guide you towards a sense of wholeness and completeness.
